title: Ascertaining accurate exposure to aspirin and other antithrombotic medications using a structured electronic health record data.
details: M Gergi, K Wilkinson, TB Plante, NA Zakai - Research and Practice in Thrombosis …, 2024
abstract: Background Ascertaining accurately the exposure to antithrombotic medications for both research and quality initiatives have been challenging due to multitude of reasons: Aspirin, the most commonly used antithrombotic is available over the …
